@m.s.ruiz - The numbers on the numpad of your keyboard, the ones at the right side, those numbers have some arrows
8 = up
4 = left
2 = down 
6 = right
TPB Doesn't let me comment it says database error when i try commenting for a fix of the VorbisFile

Ok Here is the VorbisFile.dll
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6750627/VorbisFile.dll

Download It and Place the file on the main directory of GTA San Andreas (the folder where gta_sa.exe is located)

If you want GTA_SA on you're pc you must to follow these instructions:

1) Download the Torrent whit Bittorrent
2) Place the Torrent in a map on you're desktop
4) Download now Winrar (32-bit)
5) If you done whit the Download of Winrar, click on the Torrent in you're map.
6) It's now ask wich program you want to open the Torrent. Chose winrar.
7) If you click now on the torrent is winrar open
8) you can now see the file's. Copy the files in the map whit the Torrent.
9)If i'ts done you delete the Torrent because you don't need it anymore.
10) Click now on GTA_SA and Enjoy!

i have this game in my video library,. and no probs loading from there,,

if you want this game to install properly. 
disable any protection/anti viruses,   
once you get it downloaded disable virus scanners,  ,  
get a zipper program,.  "i used "bitzipper"  then extract it to its own folder, (the option to extract to c:\users\san adreas)  will be one of the options,.   
then just simply find the extracted files in the folder you just extracted to and open that file right click the "gta_sa application icon" and run as administrator.  and that should be it, just follow the install option and play..    

this is also the AO version (adults only)  so look up on the net for the  "hot coffee" cheats,  and also go to  "gamespot com " were you will find all the cheats for the pc version "this one! there,  the cheats are easy to add, just type the letters into the keyboard during game play and you off..

cheat for health/armour/$250,000:  "HESOYAM"
dont use the quotes ="""

cheats for nutter weapons.  " UZUMYMW"

 those 2 cheats should put some money in your pockets and some weapons, "well i dont know how he carries all those" but he does,. lol..
you'll get the rest at the above website,.
hope this help,,  also i necer used any mounting to a disc just extract and run,.

forgott to say, thanks to the uploader, this is great work,. no prob's in the game,   you should do all games this way as i find other games on here from respectable uploader to, very problematic and full of fualts..  but not here so top marks, and why you not got a skull yet. cause ya should have.

Just a quick note to anyone having laggy game play or slow motion game play,.   IN THE GAME/ "GO TO "OPTIONS" THEN "DISPLAY SETTINGS" THEN "ADVANCED"  THEN DOWN TO " VISUAL FX QUALITY"  and change the setting to "LOW"  this will make it 100% normal with no lags or slow motion play.   my setting was on high and the game play was terrible very slow reactions and stuff then i cahnged it and it perfect now..  hope this helps anyone with these issues..
